items.title: Liverpool houdt Engelse titelrace spannend met gelijkspel bij Arsenal
Slot vreest voor zware knieblessure Bradley: 'Het ziet er niet best uit'
items.summary: Conor Bradley wordt al het hele seizoen geplaagd door kleine blessures, maar lijkt zich nu op te kunnen maken voor een lang revalidatieproject. De Noord-Ier verstapte zich in de blessuretijd van het duel met Arsenal ( 0-0 ) en greep naar zijn knie. Liverpool-manager Arne Slot sprak na afloop zijn zorgen uit en reageerde bovendien op het gedrag van Arsenal-aanvaller Gabriel Martinelli.

items.title: Rel tussen Simeone en Vin√≠cius: 'Onthoud dit, Florentino gaat je ontslaan!'
items.summary: Real Madrid kwam donderdagavond als winnaar uit de strijd in de halve finale van de Spaanse Super Copa tegen Atl√©tico Madrid ( 1-2 ), maar na afloop is Spanje vooral in de ban van de randzaken. Diego Simeone en Vin√≠cius J√∫nior vochten eerst op en daarna buiten het veld een relletje uit.

items.title: Ook Arne Slot bijt zich stuk op 's werelds beste defensie
Valverde and Rodrygo on target as Real Madrid hold off Atl√©tico in Super Cup
items.summary: Atl√©tico Madrid 1-2 Real Madrid S√∏rloth 58; Valverde 2, Rodrygo 55 Real Madrid hold on and so does Xabi Alonso, all the way to the final. Judgment was due to come in Jeddah but it will be put off for another day at least, and instead of the sack there may be a medal waiting at the end of a month spent on edge after Real defeated Atl√©tico 2-1. Goals from Fede Valverde and Rodrygo set up another Super Cup meeting with Barcelona on Sunday night, opportunity and obligation in one. On a night when Madrid scored after 77 seconds, Atl√©tico‚Äôs last opportunity to get a result they probably deserved and force a penalty shootout slipped agonisingly away with only 10 more seconds remaining. Juli√°n Alvarez had it, Antoine Griezmann almost did, but, in at last, a shot from the former just evaded the latter. As the ball bounced past the post, it took Atl√©tico‚Äôs hopes with it. Continue reading...

items.title: Xabi slams Simeone shouts at Vini: 'Didn't like it'
items.summary: Xabi Alonso slammed Diego Simeone for his clash with Vin√≠cius J√∫nior during Real Madrid's 2-1 Supercopa semifinal win over Atl√©tico Madrid on Thursday, saying "not anything goes."

items.title: Arsenal inch 6 pts clear with Liverpool stalemate
items.summary: Arsenal failed to extend their Premier League lead over title rivals Manchester City to eight points following a 0-0 draw against Liverpool at the Emirates.

items.title: Mourinho on shock loss: I hope players don't sleep
items.summary: An angry Benfica coach Jose Mourinho hopes his players had a sleepless night after their shock defeat to Braga in the Portuguese Allianz Cup semifinal on Wednesday.

items.title: PSG break Marseille hearts to start '26 with trophy
items.summary: Paris Saint-Germain fought back to beat Marseille 4-1 on penalties to win a dramatic Trophee des Champions in Kuwait.

items.title: FIFA picks TikTok as social video partner for WC
items.summary: GENEVA -- TikTok was picked by FIFA as the first "preferred platform" for video content on social media at a men's World Cup, the soccer body said Thursday.

items.title: Negatieve mijlpaal voor Liverpool onder Slot, voor het eerst in ruim vijftien jaar
items.summary: Voetballiefhebbers kunnen hun vingers donderdag weer aflikken. Zo speelt het Liverpool van Arne Slot in de Premier League tegen koploper Arsenal, staan Atl√©tico en Real Madrid tegenover elkaar in de halve finale van de Spaanse Supercopa en strijden Paris Saint-Germain en Olympique Marseille om de Franse Supercup. Volg alles in de VI Live.

items.title: Arsenal fail to take advantage of City slip as Liverpool hold leaders to draw
items.summary: Point proven? Well, not exactly. Just when Arsenal looked ready to lay down a real marker for their title aspirations, a rejuvenated Liverpool side that has been through the wringer since they were crowned champions last season proved the Gunners are still far from the finished article. It could have been even worse for Mikel Arteta‚Äôs side if Liverpool had been awarded one of two potential penalties or if Conor Bradley‚Äôs brilliant chip had not struck the crossbar in the first half. Arne Slot will be delighted with the way his much-maligned defence coped with Arsenal‚Äôs threat before the break. Continue reading...

items.title: Arsenal spurn chance to go eight clear as Liverpool battle to draw
items.summary: Arsenal missed the opportunity to go eight points clear at the top of the Premier League as Liverpool battled to a goalless draw at the Emirates Stadium.

Newcastle latest: Schar injury update after positive scan results
Manchester United fan group seeks to oust ‚Äòincompetent clown‚Äô Jim Ratcliffe
items.summary: The 1958 says club has become a ‚Äòlaughing stock‚Äô Protest planned at Old Trafford in early February Manchester United supporters group The 1958 has called for a vote of no confidence in the club‚Äôs ownership model, calling Sir Jim Ratcliffe ‚Äúan incompetent clown‚Äù. The organisation will also hold a protest at the home match against Fulham on 1 February to make their voices heard at Old Trafford. The group wants the removal of the Glazer family and Ratcliffe from the club. Concerns were also expressed in relation to the work of the chief executive, Omar Berrada, and the director of football, Jason Wilcox, in the aftermath of Ruben Amorim‚Äôs sacking, which will lead to an interim replacement. Continue reading...

items.title: Leeds receive permission to redevelop and lift capacity of Elland Road
items.summary: Capacity will increase from 37,645 to about 53,000 Proposals were approved by city council on Thursday Leeds have received planning permission to redevelop Elland Road and lift the stadium‚Äôs capacity from 37,645 to about 53,000. There had been fears that a delay to the long-mooted introduction of a tram network in the surrounding area until the late 2030s might impact the club‚Äôs plans to expand the ground but the proposals were approved by the city council on Thursday. Continue reading...

items.title: 'We're a laughing stock' - Man Utd fans to protest
items.summary: An influential Manchester United fan group is planning a protest against the ownership, which it accuses of "turning the club into a circus".

items.title: Sutton's FA Cup third-round predictions v DJ and producer Shadow Child
items.summary: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on DJ and producer Shadow Child - and AI - with his predictions for all 32 FA Cup third-round ties.
